languages.text: Средняя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} поглощает больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} в случае {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} по персонажу, но снижает мобильность и вероятность {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от атак.

languages.text: Mittlere {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} blockt mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, wenn der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird, verringert aber seine Mobilität und die Fähigkeit, Angriffen {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g}.

languages.text: Une {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} moyenne réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis par le personnage lorsqu'il est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g}, mais entrave sa mobilité et sa capacité à {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} les attaques.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} moyenne réduit les dégâts subis par le personnage lorsqu'il est {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touché{/g}, mais entrave sa mobilité et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} à {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g} les attaques.

languages.text: 中型{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}可以吸收更多{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，角色被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时受到的伤害会更低，但会降低角色的机动性与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击的能力。
languages.original_text: Medium {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} blocks more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} but reduces their mobility and ability to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: 中型{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}可以吸收更多伤害，角色被{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}时受到的伤害会更低，但会降低角色的机动性与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}攻击的能力。

中型{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}可以吸收更多{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，角色被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时受到的伤害会更低，但会降低角色的机动性与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击的能力。

languages.original_text: Medium armour blocks more damage if the character is hit but reduces their mobility and ability to dodge attacks.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} media absorbe más {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al recibir un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g}, pero reduce la movilidad y la capacidad de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} ataques.
languages.original_text: Medium {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} blocks more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} but reduces their mobility and ability to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} media absorbe más daño al recibir un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g}, pero reduce la movilidad y la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} ataques.

languages.text: ミディアム{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}時の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をより多く防ぐが、機動力と攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するアビリティを低下させる。
languages.original_text: Medium {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} blocks more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if the character is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} but reduces their mobility and ability to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} attacks.

traits.locale_text: ミディアム{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}時のダメージをより多く防ぐが、機動力と攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を低下させる。

ミディアム{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}時の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をより多く防ぐが、機動力と攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を低下させる。

languages.text: Orta düzey {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, karakter {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} önler ama karakterin hareket kabiliyetini ve saldırılardan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} olasılığını azaltır.

traits.locale_text: Orta düzey {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, karakter isabet aldığında daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} önler ama karakterin hareket kabiliyetini ve saldırılardan kaçınma olasılığını azaltır.
